title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 47.6 - Responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 47.6 - Responsibility

State Regulations

The owner or affected tenant or both of any building used
as a mercantile establishment or a public or commercial building or structure
shall be responsible for compliance with the provisions of this Part
(rule). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
47.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
